DIA_Brad_OhShit_07_03: Our daddy taught us not to be ashamed of our swords. Especially since there's such sharp and all.
DIA_Brad_OhShit_15_04: Yeah, I see that. Your daddy gave you good advice.
DIA_Brad_OhShit_07_05: I could kill you if I took a hard swing...
DIA_Brad_OhShit_07_07: Sometimes I swing so hard, my arms hurt.
DIA_Brad_OhShit_15_08: Well my daddy taught me a few things too, like how to use my whole body when swinging, not just my arms.
